2.post_content: On a day of love, let's spare a thought for 40 families who lost their precious jewels in # PulwamaAttack , and take pride in their valour & sacrifice. A big bow to those bravehearts üôè You live forever!

3.post_content: I'm glad to announce the timely completion of construction of new # Assam Bhawan near Salt Lake, # Kolkata by Assam # PWD . This Rs 20.65 cr facility will be inaugurated by HCM Sarbananda Sonowal on February 16. Sharing some glimpses of the newly constructed Bhawan.

comments.1: Applauds to you for the Assam bhawan. Will it be available to the common people or all rooms will be booked for politicians, bureaucrats and their relatives all through the year. We can call it a good step only when common assamese people get benefitted .
comments.2: Congratulations to you and your department for construction of wonderful project.both interior and outside looks very good,this is another milestone in the history of Assam,sir I am requesting to you please arrange water supply project,otherwise we the Guwahati people will face trouble in future.

comments.1: This types of works give mental peace. Great jobs done. God bless you, Sir.
comments.2: Great Sir, mission school burot Bible pathu bondh koribo lage, tea garden area r new LP school burot infrastructure improve koribo lage example- building, PTR etc. Thanks a lot

5.post_content: Pleased to share that Government of Assam has launched Gyan Deepika Scholarship as per announcement in Budget 2019-20. It shall provide subsidy of Rs 700 per month for 10 months through Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT) on dues to 13414 hostel students of govt colleges & state universities. Also, I'm delighted to share that Government of Assam has launched HPC Scholarship Scheme to provide financial assistance of upto Rs 1 Lakh to students whose parents are currently employed in ... Hindustan Paper Corporation's units at Pachgram & Jagi Road. The two schemes by Government of Assam are of significant importance in providing financial relief to families with children who aspire to pursue higher education. We promise to always be with students in pursuit of their dreams. # AssamEduCare # AssamAlwaysAhead See more

comments.1: Good step, perfect scheme for the students belong to Paper Mill workers' families....
comments.2: I AM TET CONTRACTUAL TEACHER, UNDER SSA, SIR, U SAID THAT ALL TEACHERS MUST TO SEE THEIRS PARENTS. SIR, MY MOTHER is SO WEAK, HER AGE IS ABOVE 75 YEARS AND MY DUTY PLACE IS 78 Kms FROM MY HOME. SO, I COULDN'T SEE MY MOTHER PERFECTLY. So I THEREFORE PRAY THAT U WILL KINDLY TRANSFER ME NEAR MY HOME VILLAGE FOR MY MOTHER. I ALREADY SUBMITTED PROPOSAL LETTER THROUGH DMC.

6.post_content: I shall be Live here from the launch of two schemes by Government of Assam - Gyan Deepika Scholarship Scheme & HPC Scholarship Scheme - at Srimanta Sankaradeva Kalakshetra, # Guwahati , around 11:30 am. I invite you all to join us. # FBLiveHBS

comments.1: Sir, your those well steps will help and alert the many students of Assam. Thank you so much for the great scheme.
